# File lib/ext_ind.rb, line 180
  def cached=(input)
    if input && !cache
      @cache_pos = self.pos
      @cache = read(nil, 0)
      
      # ensure the cache is an array of framed items...

      # if io has only one item, then read returns an 

      # array like [0] rather than [[0]]

      unless @cache.empty? || @cache.first.kind_of?(Array)
        @cache = [@cache] 
      end
    elsif !input && cache
      flush
      @cache = nil
      self.pos = @cache_pos
      @cache_pos = nil
    end
  end
